column4: hi all, a  simple question. are x86_64 and i686 architectures same on intel processors?
yes, amd64 will run on a 64bit intel and all processors past about 1994 will run the 32bit OS
check volume is not muted in gnome volume app as well as alsamixer in terminal
: please tell me how to check this out
like the previous statement said. Open terminal and run alsamixer
: i ran "sudo alsamixer" it is showing : no such file
when did I mention sudo?
i also tried : alsamixer . it is showing the same
if you run all commands with sudo you WILL break your system
: ok,sorry for that.but for now what to do?
install alsamixer and alsa
: i have downloaded the things but  still it is not working :(
: i mean alsamixer and alsa( oss) and alsa( gnome )
what is the output of: lsb_release -c
: 1 hour back it was  working properly. but to hibernate the system i downloaded the powersavermanagement utility . for then it is not working.
: the command output : Codename: lucid
ok. How did you install the OS?
: first win7  and after some days of that ubuntu 10.04. but as i said it was working fine 1 hour back but after........... not working
: one more thing . in windows sound is  intact.  but for ubuntu  ...:(
ubuntu has different support to windows. What windows does or doesn't do is of no consequence to linux
: so please tell me what to do? after alsamixer and alsa installation it is still not working.
try the alsa .23 ppa
https://launchpad.net/~ricotz/%2Barchive/unstable
will give the newer alsa, may help
